name: DARK MONUMENT
description:
A Real-Time cinematic experience showcasing simple cinematography and visuals.

A collabarative project between Hardy and Niix. A casual project across four months.

Enjoy this slightly EERIE but surprisingly calming visual experience. It's just two minutes in length and it'll loop when it's finished. We used textures from Poliigon and made this project a priority to learn Unreal Engine and to either obtain or improve our understanding of the cinematic devices in general and for games specifically. 

This can be seen as a portfolio piece and we would appreciate any critique, we welcome constructive criticism.
